00038 /****************************************************************************
00039  * Public function implementations
00040  ****************************************************************************/
00041 void
00042 arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_init(arrow_problem *problem, 
00043                             arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params *params)
00044 {
00045     params->random_restarts = 0;
00046     params->stall_count = problem->size;
00047     params->kicks = (problem->size > 1000 ? 500 : problem->size / 2);
00048     params->kick_type = CC_LK_GEOMETRIC_KICK;
00049     params->time_bound = 0.0;
00050     params->length_bound = 0.0;
00051     params->initial_tour = NULL;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void 
00055 arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_destruct(arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params *params)
00056 {
00057     if(params->initial_tour != NULL)
00058         free(params->initial_tour);
00059 }
00060 
00061 int 
00062 arrow_tsp_cc_exact_solve(arrow_problem *problem, int *initial_tour, 
00063                       arrow_tsp_result *result)
00064 {
00065     int ret;
00066     int success;
00067     double start_time, end_time;
00068     CCdatagroup *dat;
00069     CCdatagroup arrow_data;
00070     CCrandstate rstate;
00071     
00072     start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00073     
00074     /* Determine if we need to setup the userdat structure */
00075     if(problem->type == ARROW_PROBLEM_DATA_CONCORDE)
00076     {
00077         dat = (CCdatagroup *)problem->data;
00078     }
00079     else
00080     {
00081         dat = &arrow_data;
00082         CCutil_init_datagroup(dat);
00083         arrow_data.userdat.data = problem;
00084         arrow_data.userdat.edgelen = arrow_edgelen;
00085         arrow_data.userdat.copy_datagroup = arrow_copy;
00086         CCutil_dat_setnorm(dat, CC_USER);
00087     }
00088     
00089     arrow_debug("TSP Problem Name: '%s'\n", problem->name);
00090     
00091     CCutil_sprand((int)CCutil_real_zeit(), &rstate);
00092     ret = CCtsp_solve_dat(
00093             problem->size,          // int ncount
00094             dat,                    // CCdatagroup *indat
00095             initial_tour,           // int *in_tour
00096             result->tour,           // int *out_tour
00097             NULL,                   // double *in_val
00098             &(result->obj_value),   // double *optval
00099             &success,               // int *success
00100             &(result->found_tour),  // int *foundtour
00101             problem->name,          // char *name
00102             NULL,                   // double *timebound
00103             NULL,                   // int *hit_timebound
00104             1,                      // int silent
00105             &rstate                 // CCrandstate *rstate
00106         );
00107     
00108     end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00109     result->total_time = end_time - start_time;
00110         
00111     if(result->found_tour && success)
00112         return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00113     else
00114         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00115 }
00116 
00117 int
00118 arrow_tsp_cc_lk_solve(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params *params,
00119                       arrow_tsp_result *result)
00120 {
00121     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00122     int cc_ret;
00123     int ecount;
00124     int *elist = (int *) NULL;
00125     int *cyc = (int *) NULL;
00126     int *bestcyc = (int *) NULL;
00127     int *tmp;
00128     int i;
00129     double val, bestval;
00130     double start_time, end_time;
00131     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params lk_params;
00132     CCdatagroup *dat;
00133     CCdatagroup arrow_data;
00134     CCedgegengroup plan;
00135     CCrandstate rstate;
00136     
00137     start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00138     
00139     /* Some of the following code is heavily copied from the find_tour
00140        method in Concorde's TSP/concorde.c */
00141     //arrow_debug("Entering arrow_tsp_cc_lk_solve\n");
00142     
00143     /* Determine if we need to setup the userdat structure */
00144     if(problem->type == ARROW_PROBLEM_DATA_CONCORDE)
00145     {
00146         //arrow_debug("Using passed Concorde data structure\n");
00147         dat = (CCdatagroup *)problem->data;
00148     }
00149     else
00150     {
00151         //arrow_debug("Using passed Arrow data structure\n");
00152         dat = &arrow_data;
00153         CCutil_init_datagroup(dat);
00154         arrow_data.userdat.data = problem;
00155         arrow_data.userdat.edgelen = arrow_edgelen;
00156         arrow_data.userdat.copy_datagroup = arrow_copy;
00157         CCutil_dat_setnorm(dat, CC_USER);
00158     }
00159     
00160     /* Set default params if none are passed */
00161     if(params == NULL)
00162     {
00163         //arrow_debug(" - No parameters set, so using default.\n");
00164         arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_init(problem, &lk_params);
00165     }
00166     else
00167     {
00168         //arrow_debug(" - Passed parameters.\n");
00169         lk_params = *params;
00170     }
00171     /*
00172     arrow_debug("     - random_restarts = %d\n", lk_params.random_restarts);
00173     arrow_debug("     - stall_count = %d\n", lk_params.stall_count);
00174     arrow_debug("     - kicks = %d\n", lk_params.kicks);
00175     arrow_debug("     - kick_type = %d\n", lk_params.kick_type);
00176     arrow_debug("     - time_bound = %1.2f\n", lk_params.time_bound);
00177     arrow_debug("     - length_bound = %.0f\n", lk_params.length_bound);
00178     */
00179     CCutil_sprand((int)CCutil_real_zeit(), &rstate);
00180     
00181     /* cyc temporarily holds a tour found by the LK algorithm */
00182     cyc = CC_SAFE_MALLOC(problem->size, int);
00183     if(cyc == NULL)
00184     {
00185         arrow_print_error("Out of memory for cyc");
00186         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00187     }
00188     bestcyc = CC_SAFE_MALLOC(problem->size, int);
00189     if(cyc == NULL)
00190     {
00191         arrow_print_error("Out of memory for bestcyc");
00192         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00193     }
00194     
00195     /* We start by building up a set of "good" edges for the heuristic
00196        to chew upon */
00197     //arrow_debug(" - Building set of 'good' edges... ");
00198     CCedgegen_init_edgegengroup(&plan);
00199     plan.quadnearest = 2;
00200     cc_ret = CCedgegen_edges(&plan, problem->size, dat, 
00201                              (double *) NULL, &ecount, &elist, 1, &rstate);
00202     if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00203     {
00204         arrow_print_error("CCedgegen_edges failed");
00205         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00206         goto CLEANUP;
00207     }
00208     plan.quadnearest = 0;
00209     //arrow_debug("done.\n");
00210     
00211     /* If none is passed, we construct an initial starting tour */
00212     if(lk_params.initial_tour == NULL)
00213     {
00214         //arrow_debug(" - Building initial tour... ");
00215         build_initial_tour(problem->size, dat, &plan, &rstate, cyc);
00216         //arrow_debug("done.\n");
00217     }
00218     else
00219     {
00220         cyc = lk_params.initial_tour;
00221     }
00222     
00223     /* Initial LK call */
00224     arrow_debug(" - Initial call to the LK algorithm...\n");
00225     cc_ret = CClinkern_tour(problem->size, dat, ecount, elist, 
00226                             params->stall_count, params->kicks,
00227                             cyc, bestcyc, &bestval, 1, 
00228                             params->time_bound, params->length_bound,
00229                             (char *) NULL, params->kick_type, &rstate);
00230     arrow_debug("     - Found tour of length '%.0f'.\n", bestval);
00231     if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00232     {
00233         arrow_print_error("CClinkern_tour failed");
00234         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00235         goto CLEANUP;
00236     }
00237     
00238     /* Now begin the random restart phase if necessary */
00239     for(i = 0; (i < lk_params.random_restarts) 
00240         && (bestval > lk_params.length_bound); i++)
00241     {
00242         arrow_debug(" - Trial %d of %d to LK algorithm...\n", i + 1, 
00243                     lk_params.random_restarts);
00244         cc_ret = CClinkern_tour(problem->size, dat, ecount, 
00245                                 elist, params->stall_count, params->kicks,
00246                                 (int *) NULL, cyc, &val, 1, 
00247                                 params->time_bound, params->length_bound,
00248                                 (char *) NULL, params->kick_type, &rstate);
00249         arrow_debug("     - Found tour of length '%.0f'.\n", val);
00250         if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00251         {
00252             arrow_print_error("CClinkern_tour failed");
00253             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00254             goto CLEANUP;
00255         }
00256         if (val < bestval) {
00257             arrow_debug("     - Found a better tour (%.0f vs %.0f) so swap\n",
00258                         val, bestval);
00259             CC_SWAP (cyc, bestcyc, tmp);
00260             bestval = val;
00261         }
00262     }
00263     
00264     if((lk_params.random_restarts > 0) && (bestval > lk_params.length_bound))
00265     {
00266         arrow_debug(" - Final attempt to find tour...\n");
00267         cc_ret = CClinkern_tour(problem->size, dat, ecount, 
00268                                 elist, params->stall_count, 2 * params->kicks,
00269                                 bestcyc, result->tour, &(result->obj_value),
00270                                 1, params->time_bound, params->length_bound,
00271                                 (char *) NULL, params->kick_type, &rstate);
00272         arrow_debug("     - Found tour of length '%.0f'.\n", result->obj_value);
00273         if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00274         {
00275             arrow_print_error("CClinkern_tour failed");
00276             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00277             goto CLEANUP;
00278         }
00279     }
00280     else
00281     {
00282         //printf(" - Copying over found tour\n");
00283         result->obj_value = bestval;
00284         if(result->tour != NULL)
00285         {
00286             for (i = 0; i < problem->size; i++)
00287             {
00288                 result->tour[i] = bestcyc[i];
00289             }
00290         }
00291         //else
00292             //arrow_debug("tour is NULL\n");
00293     }
00294 
00295 CLEANUP:
00296     if(ret) result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00297     end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00298     result->total_time = end_time - start_time;
00299     
00300     //arrow_debug(" - Cleaning up\n");
00301     CC_IFFREE(cyc, int);
00302     CC_IFFREE(elist, int);
00303     CC_IFFREE(bestcyc, int);
00304     
00305     if(params == NULL)
00306         arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_destruct(&lk_params);
00307     
00308     //arrow_debug("Leaving arrow_tsp_cc_lk_solve\n");
00309     return ret;
00310 }
00311 
00312 
00313 /****************************************************************************
00314  * Private function implementations
00315  ****************************************************************************/
00316 int
00317 build_initial_tour(int ncount, CCdatagroup *dat, CCedgegengroup *plan, 
00318                    CCrandstate *rstate, int *initial_tour)
00319 {
00320     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00321     int cc_ret;
00322     int tcount, istour;
00323     int *tlist = (int *) NULL;
00324     
00325     plan->tour.greedy = 1;
00326     cc_ret = CCedgegen_edges(plan, ncount, dat, (double *) NULL, 
00327                              &tcount, &tlist, 1, rstate);
00328     if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00329     {
00330         arrow_print_error("CCedgegen_edges failed");
00331         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00332         goto CLEANUP;
00333     }
00334     if(tcount != ncount) {
00335         arrow_print_error("Wrong edgeset from CCedgegen_edges");
00336         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00337         goto CLEANUP;
00338     }
00339 
00340     cc_ret = CCutil_edge_to_cycle(ncount, tlist, &istour, initial_tour);
00341     if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00342     {
00343         arrow_print_error("CCutil_edge_to_cycle failed");
00344         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00345         goto CLEANUP;
00346     }
00347     if(istour == ARROW_FALSE) {
00348         arrow_print_error("Starting tour has an error\n");
00349         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00350         goto CLEANUP;
00351     }
00352     
00353 CLEANUP:
00354     CC_FREE(tlist, int);
00355     return ret;
00356 }
00357 
00358 static int 
00359 arrow_edgelen(int i, int j, struct CCdatagroup *dat)
00360 {
00361     arrow_problem *data = (arrow_problem *)dat->userdat.data;
00362     return data->get_cost(data, i, j);
00363 }
00364 
00365 static int
00366 arrow_copy(int ncount, struct CCdatagroup *in, struct CCdatagroup *out)
00367 {        
00368     out->userdat.data = in->userdat.data;        
00369     out->userdat.edgelen = in->userdat.edgelen;
00370     out->userdat.copy_datagroup = in->userdat.copy_datagroup;
00371     CCutil_dat_setnorm(out, CC_USER);
00372     return 0;
00373 }
